description: Armenia and Azerbaijan hold their first direct talks after two weeks of fighting over the region.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh: Moscow talks raise hope of ceasefire
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh: Moscow talks raise hope of ceasefire - BBC News
maintext: Nagorno-Karabakh is run by ethnic Armenians although it is officially part of Azerbaijan. The two former Soviet republics have blamed each other for the latest outbreak of violence - the worst in decades.
